sentence.Network_en: Explain what a suzerain - vassal treaty was in the ancient Near East.
sentence.Network_cn: 解释什么是在古老近东的宗主附庸条约.

sentence.Network_en: Wei Zhuang , suzerain of the Huajian Ci field, is a famous poet in late TangDynasty.
sentence.Network_cn: 韦庄是晚唐著名诗人,又是“花间宗主”.

sentence.Network_en: And modern immigrants have become force that cannot be neglected for a suzerain state.
sentence.Network_cn: 现代移民对宗主国来说已经成为一支不可忽视的建设力量.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 领主（suzerain）：是赐予卡玛利拉会议领地的血族，suzerain原意是宗主国，也就是说他就是一片领地最高主人。通常一世纪一任， …
百度词典搜索_宗 ... 宗室[ royal clan] 宗主国[ suzerain;colonial power] 宗主权[ suzerainty].

list.abs: 宗法关系,relation of patriarchal... ... ) suzerain-vassal relationship 宗藩关系 ) suzerain-vassal relations 宗藩关系.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French, apparently from sus 'above' (from Latin su(r)sum 'upward'), suggested by souverain 'sovereign'

means.word_mean: 1. a state exercising a degree of dominion over a dependent state especially in its foreign affairs
